insert into category (name, parent_id, create_date, update_date) values (#{name}, #{parentId}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate})
mapper.select: select from category where parent_id IS NULL

SELECT cg.id, cg.name as "name", cg.parent_id, date_format(cg.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as "createDate", date_format(cg.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as "updateDate", cg2.name as "parentName" FROM category cg LEFT JOIN category cg2 on cg.parent_id = cg2.id WHERE cg.parent_id = #{pid}
